test.name: Login Logout Functionality

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
WebDriverException: Message: 'chromedriver.exe' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
